profile:
At Laric Furniture & Kitchen Refinishing in Port Moody, we serve anyone who needs furniture or kitchens restored. Our clients include cabinet makers, interior designers, upholsterers, piano restoration companies, restaurants, schools, insurance companies, local governments and private individuals. We specialize in repairs and touch-ups, refinishing, cabinets and antiques. Our owner, Daniel, has a passion for working with wood and personally ensures quality.

Call us to make an appointment; due to the nature of our work, we often are out of the shop.
services:
Kitchen cabinet Refacing, Kitchen cabinet Refinishing,
Kitchen cabinet painting, Cabinet Refacing, Kitchen Restoration, Kitchen Renovation, Furniture Stripping, Furniture Refinishing, Furniture Painting, Furniture Repair, Handwoven Cane, Handwoven Danish Cord, Handwoven Rush, Modern Cane Inset, Piano Refinishing, Piano Painting, Custom Millwork, Custom Made Cabinets, Custom Made Kitchen, Wood Finisher, Architectural Wood Finish
specialities:
Furniture repair and refinishing
Custom cabinet & millwork refinishing
name: Laric Furniture & Kitchen Refinishing

profile:
Fibrenew Mid Valley specializes in the repair, restoration and renewal of leather, plastics, vinyl, fabric and upholstery servicing six major markets: automotive, aviation, commercial, medical, marine and residential. Utilizing our services to repair damaged materials in your vehicle, boat, airplane, home or office offers an environmentally-friendly and cost-effective alternative to replacement.

Leather Repair, Vinyl Restoration and Plastic Renewal Services in: Coquitlam, British Columbia; Langley Township, British Columbia; Maple Ridge, British Columbia; Port Coquitlam, British Columbia; Mission, British Columbia; Port Moody, British Columbia; Pitt Meadows, British Columbia
